channel.title: Smf forums help! no one will help on moparisbest so i posted here!
channel.description:
I have a SMF forums
I need to add images infront of a username like Admin = admin image how would i do this?
i have added the images to the CPanel justn eed to add infront of username thanks

item.title: Smf forums help! no one will help on moparisbest so i posted here!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

On your Online List Format for Admins, put:

<img src="http://209.85.62.26/12341/149/emo/GOLD.GIF" border=0><span style='color:red'><b>

Which is a Gold Crown, if you need the Ones for Player Mod or Forum Mod, Pm me.
